mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menuoption o JOIN menu m ON o.menuId = m.menuId WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
SELECT (option_id, menu_id, option_name, option_content, option_price, option_create_date, option_modified_date) FROM menuoption WHERE menu_id =#{menuId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Menu SET ( menu_price = #{menuPrice}, menu_picture_url = #{menuPictureUrl}, menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_category = #{menuCategory}, menu_description = #{menuDescription}, menu_modified_date = NOW()) WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}

INSERT INTO MenuOption ( option_id, menu_id, option_name, option_content, option_price, option_create_date, option_modified_date) VALUES ( #{optionId}, #{menuId}, #{optionName}, #{optionContent}, #{optionPrice}, NOW(), NOW() )
